00029 #define BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL template <bitsize_t Bits, bool Secure, class \
00030     Alloc>
00031 #define BOOST_XINT_RAWINT raw_integer_t<Bits, Secure, Alloc>
00032 
00033 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00034 class raw_integer_t {
00035     public:
00036     typedef magnitude_manager_t<Bits, Secure, Alloc> datatype;
00037     typedef base_divide_t<BOOST_XINT_RAWINT> divide_t;
00038 
00039     size_t length;
00040     bool negative;
00041 
00042     raw_integer_t(): length(1), negative(false), changed(false) { }
00043     raw_integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& copy): length(copy.length),
00044         negative(copy.negative), changed(false), data(copy.data) { }
00045     template <bitsize_t B, bool S, class A>
00046     raw_integer_t(const raw_integer_t<B,S,A>& copy): length(copy.length),
00047         negative(copy.negative), changed(true), data(copy.data) { make_unique();
00048         if (length > max_length()) length = max_length();
00049         trim(); }
00050     raw_integer_t(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& copy, bool neg, bool allow_zero =
00051         false): length(copy.length), negative(neg), changed(false),
00052         data(copy.data) { trim(allow_zero); }
00053     template <typename T>
00054     raw_integer_t(T n, size_t prealloc = 0, typename boost::enable_if<
00055         boost::is_integral<T> >::type* = 0): length(1), negative(false),
00056         changed(false) { if (std::numeric_limits<T>::is_signed) set_signed(n,
00057         prealloc); else set_unsigned(n, false, prealloc); }
00058     template <typename charT>
00059     raw_integer_t(const charT *s, size_t base = 10): length(1), negative(false),
00060         changed(false) { from_string(s, base); }
00061     template <typename charT>
00062     raw_integer_t(const std::basic_string<charT>& s, size_t base = 10):
00063         length(1), negative(false), changed(false) { from_string(s, base); }
00064     raw_integer_t(const xint::binary_t b, size_t bits = 0): length(1),
00065         negative(false), changed(false) { from_binary(b, bits); }
00066 
00067     BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& operator=(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& set) { length =
00068         set.length; negative = set.negative; data = set.data; return *this; }
00069 
00070     digit_t *digits(size_t resize, realloc::strategy strategy = realloc::copy);
00071     const digit_t *digits() const { return data.digits(); }
00072 
00073     digit_t get_digit(size_t i) const { return (i < max_length() ? digits()[i] :
00074         0); }
00075     digit_t operator[](size_t i) { return digits()[i]; }
00076     digit_t operator[](size_t i) const { return get_digit(i); }
00077     size_t max_length() const { return data.max_length(); }
00078     bool same_storage(const BOOST_XINT_RAWINT n) const { return
00079         data.same_storage(n.data); }
00080 
00081     int sign() const { return negative ? -1 : is_zero() ? 0 : 1; }
00082     int sign(bool allow_signed_zero) const { return (!allow_signed_zero &&
00083         is_zero() ? 0 : negative ? -1 : 1); }
00084     bool is_zero() const { return (length == 1 && digits()[0] == 0); }
00085     bool is_odd() const { return (digits()[0] & 0x01) != 0; }
00086     bool is_even() const { return (digits()[0] & 0x01) == 0; }
00087     size_t hex_digits() const { return (log2(*this) + 3) / 4; }
00088     raw_integer_t abs() const { return raw_integer_t(*this, false); }
00089     raw_integer_t negate() const { return raw_integer_t(*this, !negative); }
00090 
00091     void set(int n) { set_signed(n); }
00092     void set_signed(boost::intmax_t n, size_t prealloc = 0);
00093     void set_unsigned(boost::uintmax_t n, bool neg = false, size_t prealloc =
00094         0);
00095 
00096     bool is_nan() const { return data.is_nan(); }
00097     void make_nan() { data.make_nan(); }
00098 
00099     bool is_unique() const { return data.is_unique(); }
00100     void make_unique() { if (!is_unique()) data.resize_and_uniquify(length); }

00154 
00155 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00156 digit_t *BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::digits(size_t resize, realloc::strategy strategy) {
00157     data.resize_and_uniquify(resize, strategy);
00158     if (resize == 0 || resize > data.max_length()) resize = data.max_length();
00159     if (strategy != realloc::copy) {
00160         if (length < resize) {
00161             if (strategy == realloc::extend) {
00162                 digit_t *d = data.digits(), *p = d + length, *pe = d + resize;
00163                 while (p != pe) *p++ = 0;
00164             }
00165             length = resize;
00166         } else if (length > data.max_length()) length = data.max_length();
00167     } else if (length > data.max_length()) length = data.max_length();
00168     changed = true;
00169     return data.digits();
00170 }
00171 
00172 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00173 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::set_signed(boost::intmax_t n, size_t prealloc) {
00174     if (n >= 0) {
00175         if (n <= digit_mask) {
00176             length = 1;
00177             negative = false;
00178             if (prealloc != 0) {
00179                 digits(prealloc, realloc::zero)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00180             } else {
00181                 digits(1, realloc::ignore)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00182             }
00183             trim();
00184         } else set_unsigned(n, false, prealloc);
00185     } else if (n == (std::numeric_limits<boost::intmax_t>::min)()) {
00186         // Have to treat the minimum number carefully, because -n is not
00187         // what you'd think it is.
00188         set_unsigned(-(n + 1), true, prealloc);
00189         --*this;
00190     } else set_unsigned(-n, true, prealloc);
00191 }
00192 
00193 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00194 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::set_unsigned(boost::uintmax_t n, bool neg, size_t
00195     prealloc)
00196 {
00197     if (n <= digit_mask) {
00198         length = 1;
00199         if (prealloc != 0) {
00200             digits(prealloc, realloc::zero)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00201         } else {
00202             digits(1, realloc::ignore)[0] = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00203         }
00204     } else {
00205         digit_t *d = digits((std::max)(digits_in_uintmax, prealloc),
00206             realloc::ignore), *i = d, *ie = i + max_length();
00207         while (n != 0 && i != ie) {
00208             *i++ = static_cast<digit_t>(n);
00209             n >>= bits_per_digit;
00210         }
00211         length = (i - d);
00212     }
00213     negative = neg;
00214     trim();
00215 }
00216 
00217 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00218 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::trim(bool allow_negative_zero) {
00219     assert(length <= max_length());
00220 
00221     bool zero = false;
00222     if (changed) {
00223         data.trim();
00224         if (length > 1) {
00225             digit_t *d = data.digits(), *i = d + length - 1;
00226             if (*i == 0) {
00227                 do { --i; } while (i > d && *i == 0);
00228                 length = size_t(i - d) + 1;
00229                 if (i == d && *i == 0) zero = true;
00230             }
00231         } else if (data.digits()[0] == 0) zero = true;
00232         changed = false;
00233     } else if (length == 1 && data.digits()[0] == 0) zero = true;
00234     if (zero && !allow_negative_zero) negative = false;
00235 }
00236 
00237 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00238 void BOOST_XINT_RAWINT::_swap(BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& i2) {
00239     using std::swap;
00240     swap(length, i2.length);
00241     swap(negative, i2.negative);
00242     swap(changed, i2.changed);
00243     swap(data, i2.data);
00244 }

00249 BOOST_XINT_RAWINT_TPL
00250 void swap(BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& i1, BOOST_XINT_RAWINT& i2) {
00251     i1._swap(i2);
00252 }
